author: adrianc
msg: 1. Replace DCL code with lazy-initializer class.
2. Remove class name from static method calls.

When they were written, the deprecated methods simulated forthcoming Java 6 functionality - with the intent that they would be replaced with Java 6 equivalents, but the Java 6 functionality behaves differently than the deprecated methods. So, replacing the deprecated methods with Java 6 equivalents would cause undesired behavior.
